channel.title: Machine Learning on Ricardo

item.title: Graduate admission with Machine Learning.
item.description: Graduate admission using Machine Learning The graduate admission can be really tough for most of the students. As a student that want to form part of a graduate school, i wonder myself, what are my chance to get into one of this schools? In the webpage Kaggle, i found this incredible dataset that collect data from undergraduate students, such as the University Rating (the University place where study their undergraduate), their CGPA, their TOEFL Score and others.
